1.content:
Here are the characters you can start off with. They are:

Cecelia "Cece" Jones (Bella Thorne)

Flynn Jones (Davis Cleveland)

Raquel "Rockey" Blue (Zendaya)

Ty Blue (Roshen Fegan)

Duece Martinez (Adam Irigoyen)

Gunther Hessenheffer ( Kenton Duty)

Tinka Hessenheffer ( Carolina Sunshine)

Here are some pairs.

155.title: add here if you think of characters

info.brief_description: This is a story where you can swap the personalities of characters from Shake it Up.
info.description:
This is a story where the characters of Shake It Up swap personalities. You then see how the story unfolds from there.

There are only two rules:

There can be sex, but limit it to implication only.
Try to make each chapter at least 2 paragraphs, please.
